Message:
One of when I,
the great Gil’uial,
was just born.

The place I called home
was located on the farthest
reaches of Fran.
A village created by witches.

Needless to say,
my mother was also a witch.
But soon after
giving birth to me,
she left, never to return.

As you know, just because
witch blood runs through
one’s veins, it doesn’t mean
one will become a witch.

Hence, it’s a village custom
to exile those who
don’t become witches.

Villagers undergo training until
their talents are discerned...

Ah...! But, my birth
was extraordinary,
for I was born with
the ability to use magic.

Thus, the village witnessed
the birth of its youngest
witch in history.

Gehe! Do you wish to
hear what happens next?
